news.headline: Mowyw now comes with data sources
news.msg: Mowyw now has data sources and iterators, which make it easy to get data out of XML, YAML and (presumably) SQL.

news.headline: Get Mowyw[TM] now - cheaper than ever!
news.msg: The Mowyw[TM] Professional[R] packages is now available for only USD 250. Send me an email for details!
